case_title: GUL AMIN AND Another vs Haji MUHAMMAD AKRAM

facts.court_of_origin: Additional District Judge, Malakand at Batkhela
facts.application_request: Withdrawal of suit with liberty to file a fresh suit

respondents_objections.timeliness: Petition for withdrawal was not within time
respondents_objections.compensation_request: Rs. 2,500 as compensation for litigation expenses

lower_court_decision.permission_granted: Allowed withdrawal of suit with liberty to file a fresh suit
lower_court_decision.condition: Payment of Rs. 100 as costs to contesting respondents

issues.formal_defects: No formal defects identified in the suit
grounds_for_withdrawal: Omission of documents or their list

petitioners.contention: No formal defect exists to justify withdrawal
petitioners.legal_reference: Ahmad Din and 3 others v. Town Committee (1972 S.C.M.R. 205)
petitioners.request: Vacate withdrawal order and remit appeal for decision on merits

reasoning: No reasons provided for allowing withdrawal with liberty to sue afresh
Material irregularity in exercise of jurisdiction by lower court
decision.remittance: Case remitted to Additional District Judge, Malakand at Batkhela for decision on merits

legal_references: Ahmad Din and 3 others v. Town Committee (1972 S.C.M.R. 205)
